SELECT COUNT(p.id) FROM `attendance`.`project` p LEFT JOIN `attendance`.`items` i ON p.`items_id`=i.`id`
p.`staff_id`=#{staff_id}
and i.`items_name` like concat("%",#{items_name},"%")
and p.`project_name` like concat("%",#{project_name},"%")

SELECT p.`id`, p.`conglomerate_id`, p.`items_id`, p.`staff_id`, p.`participant`, p.`project_name`, p.`start_time`, p.`start_timeC`, p.`end_time`, p.`end_timeC`, p.`amount`, p.`uptime`, p.`uptimeC`, i.`items_name` AS `items_name`, s.`staff_name` AS `staff_name` FROM `attendance`.`project` p LEFT JOIN `attendance`.`items` i ON p.`items_id`=i.`id` LEFT JOIN `attendance`.`staff` s ON p.`staff_id`=s.`id` WHERE p.`id`=#{id}
